advancedchatbox.config.chatsuggestor.inf:
Whether or not §6player names§r are suggested in chat
These show up by pressing tab

Whether or not §6shortcuts§r are suggested as you type
Shortcuts are a way to bind a memorable phrase to a string of text, such as for emoticons
To use shortcuts, put a §6colon (§f:§6)§r and the shortcut name, and press §6tab

Whether or not the §6chat calculator§r is active
To use the chat calculator, put a §6math expression§r inside of §6[§fBrackets§6]§r, and press §6tab§r in the brackets
Expressions follow the format of §6mXParser
Whether or not the §6spell-checker§r is active
advancedchatbox.config.chatformatter.inf: Whether or not custom colors are used to highlight part of a §6command§r in the §9Chat HUD
Whether or not §6JSON§r is parsed and highlighted in the §9Chat HUD
Whether or not §6color codes§r with §6&§r are parsed and highlighted in their respected color
advancedchatbox.config.commandcolorer.in: What color a command is by default
The color that highlights an incorrect command

The palette the command colorer uses for parts of commands.
Custom ones can be declared in §7~/minecraft/config/advancedchat/colors.toml
advancedchatbox.config.general.info.back: What color the §6background§r of the §dChat Suggestor§r should be
advancedchatbox.config.general.info.sugg: The §6maximum number of suggestions§r that the §dChat Suggestor§r should display at once
advancedchatbox.config.general.info.remo:
Whether or not the §6namespace§r should be omitted from the §dChat Suggestor§r
The namespace is the part of the ID that §6preceeds§r the colon and 
includes the colon, such as '§6minecraft:§r' in minecraft:stone
advancedchatbox.config.general.info.prun: Whether or not §6non-real players§r, such as the fake players used in BungeeTabListPlus, are removed from the §dChatSuggestor
advancedchatbox.config.general.info.avai: What color §6custom chat suggestors§r will show up as
advancedchatbox.config.spellchecker.info:
The format of the text that appears when you hover your mouse over a suggested spelling change
§b$1§r is the first part of the description, up to the suggested change
§b$2§r is the actual spelling suggestion
§b$3§r is any additional information that the spell checker may provide
